content:
Add a Chart to a FlexCard

Display data on a FlexCard as a chart with the Chart element. Select from bar, pie, donut, line, and radar chart types.

From the FlexCards tab, click a version of a FlexCard to open the FlexCard Designer.
Drag a Chart element from the Build panel into a state on the canvas.
(Optional) Update the Element Name field.
(Optional) To display a title at the top of the chart, update these properties:

In the Title field, enter a title for the chart.

Make sure Hide Header isn’t selected.

From the Type dropdown, select the type of chart to display.
(Optional) To adjust your chart's proportions, update the Aspect Ratio. 
(Optional) Enter a number in the Chart Height field.
From the Label Node dropdown, select the field whose values are used to categorize the data.
From the Value Node dropdown, select the field whose values are used to populate the chart.
Select the color scheme for your chart from the Color Palette dropdown.

What’s next: Preview your FlexCard. See Preview a FlexCard.
title: Adding Charts to FlexCards in OmniStudio
